long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PasteBuddy helps you get more out of your clipboard. Copy as many items to your clipboard as you want, and retrieve them with a simple command. 

Use this tool to save time when you need to copy/paste multiple inputs from one document to another!

Features:
+ Paste from context menu
+ Paste from hotkeys
+ Save via hotkey
+ Save via UX
+ Persistent storage
+ Clear Cache at any time!
